item.title: FLOW3 1.1 Sneak Preview: Form API and -Builder
item.description: FLOW3 1.1 will contain a powerful framework to create web forms, along with a graphical IDE for creating and editing them. Read on for details and a screencast!

item.title: Budget use in the TYPO3 Phoenix and FLOW3 project
item.description: This article describes the use of funds granted to the TYPO3 Phoenix and FLOW3 project in 2011 and explains the budget application we handed in (and had granted) for 2012.
item.author: karsten@typo3.org

item.title: TYPO3 Phoenix and FLOW3 - February 2012
item.description: After the massive amount of newsworthy things in January, the February turned out to be a little less intense when it comes to new things. Nevertheless work on Phoenix and FLOW3 continued full scale,...
item.author: karsten@typo3.org

item.title: FLOW3 1.0.3 has been released
item.description: FLOW3 1.0.3, the third patch release of the PHP application framework has been released.

item.title: Heads first into a new year - January 2012
item.description: After an exciting 2011 we have meanwhile completed the first month of 2012. Just like probably everyone else we have some ideas for doing things better than in the past, and this includes...
item.author: karsten@typo3.org

item.title: FLOW3 1.0.2 has been released
item.description: Today FLOW3 1.0.2, the second patch release of the PHP application framework has been released.
item.author: karsten@typo3.org

item.title: FLOW3 1.0.1 has been released
item.description: Today FLOW3 1.0.1, the first patch release of the PHP application framework has been released.
item.author: karsten@typo3.org

item.title: FLOW3 1.0.0 has been released
item.description: Today FLOW3 1.0, the first stable version of the PHP application framework has been released.
item.author: karsten@typo3.org

item.title: FLOW3 1.0 release date set to Oct 20th, 2011
item.description: During the T3CON11 in Hanau end of last week the release date for FLOW3 1.0 was announced.
item.author: karsten@typo3.org

item.title: FLOW3 1.0.0 beta 2 Released
item.description: The FLOW3 core team is delighted to announce the release of FLOW3 1.0.0 beta 2. Thanks to the feedback of FLOW3 users we could identify and fix several bugs and introduce a handful of smaller...
item.author: robert@typo3.org
